pages.text: Waystones are a better way of transport.
The waystone can be crafted from many materials

pages.title: Waystone Menu
pages.text: The waystone menu allows for you to see all the waystones you have found, and public waystones set by other players.

pages.title: Waystone Settings
pages.text: The Waystone settings allows you to rename and change your options for Waystones. $(br2)You can also set your waystone as a public waystone to show to other players on the same server.
